text: The Fratellis are a Scottish indie rock band from Glasgow. They have released a #2 album on the United Kingdom album chart, one top ten album as well as three top 10 singles. They have also made a live DVD called Edgy In Brixton. == References == Category:2005 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:2000s British music groups Category:2010s British music groups Category:Indie rock bands Category:Musical groups from Glasgow Category:British punk bands Category:Scottish rock bands Category:2000s establishments in Scotland
title: The Fratellis
